paper_abstract: Fuzzy control has long been applied to industry with several important theoretical results and successful results. Originally introduced as model-free control design approach, model-based fuzzy control has gained widespread significance in the past decade. This paper presents a survey on recent developments of analysis and design of fuzzy control systems focused on industrial applications reported after 2000. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A survey on industrial applications of fuzzy control
